author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 48-year-old fisherman of Kottaippattinam was injured when Sri Lankan naval personnel allegedly threw stones at a boat while fishing mid-sea early Thursday.

The incident happened when a group of fishermen were engaged in fishing reportedly near the International Maritime Boundary Line, according to official sources.

The fisherman, Mansur who ventured into sea on Wednesday, was injured in the right eye and was rushed to a private hospital in Manamelkudi.

After first aid, he was admitted to the Aravind Eye Hospital in Madurai.
title: Fisherman injured in stone pelting
